details: Short-sleeved polo shirt made of ribbed knit fabric with vertical lines, providing a textured appearance
The shirt features a classic collar with a slightly spread point design, made from the same ribbed fabric
A partial placket with buttons, likely three, with a subtle contrast in color or material for added detail
Slim fit cut that contours to the body, emphasizing a tailored silhouette
Hem is straight and simple, without visible embellishments or added design elements

suggestions.party: For a party, pair this ribbed brown polo shirt with a sleek black leather skirt or fitted high-waisted trousers. Add statement jewelry such as gold hoop earrings and layered necklaces. Complete the look with strappy high heels or ankle boots in a matching or metallic finish. Accessorize with a small clutch or crossbody bag and a stylish belt for added flair.
suggestions.office: For a professional office look, tuck this polo shirt into a high-waisted pencil skirt in a neutral or contrasting color like beige or navy. Add a structured blazer for a polished appearance. Wear classic pumps in black or nude. Accessorize with a subtle watch, modest earrings, and a leather tote or structured handbag. Finish with a sleek hairstyle and minimal makeup.
suggestions.vacation: For a vacation outfit, wear this polo shirt with light-colored linen shorts or a flowy maxi skirt for a relaxed vibe. Add comfortable sandals or espadrilles and a wide-brimmed straw hat for sun protection. Carry a woven tote or beach bag, and accessorize with sunglasses and simple jewelry like bracelets or anklets. Consider layering with a light kimono or cover-up for added comfort.
